alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Hardin; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meade, west central Hardin and east central Breckinridge Counties through 1215 AM EDT/1115 PM CDT/... At 1144 PM EDT/1044 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Hardinsburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Meade, west central Hardin and east central Breckinridge Counties, including the following locations... Maples Corner, Guston, High Plains Corner, Rock Haven, Grahamton, Irvington, Hughes Landing, Big Spring, Haysville and Buck Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
